name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Appellant, v. Joel L. DIAMOND

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Appellant, v. Joel L. DIAMOND.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Timothy P. Wile, Lansdale, Harold H. Cramer, Philadelphia, John L. Heaton, Harrisburg, for Comm., D.O.T.
Bernard M. Berman, Stephen M. Asbel, Media, for J. Diamond.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 826
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Appellant, v. Joel L. DIAMOND.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 24, 1994.
Decided Jan. 19, 1995.
Timothy P. Wile, Lansdale, Harold H. Cramer, Philadelphia, John L. Heaton, Harrisburg, for Comm., D.O.T.
Bernard M. Berman, Stephen M. Asbel, Media, for J. Diamond.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
